org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color

Class ColorRGBA

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color.Color
      • org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color.ColorRGBA

  • public class ColorRGBA
extends Color
    Implements a single color in the RGB/RGBA space

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorRGBA(int r, int g, int b)
      Instantiate a 3-channel (no transparency) RGB(A) color
      ColorRGBA(int r, int g, int b, int a)
      Instantiate a 4-channel RGBA color
      ColorRGBA(Scalar scalar)
      Instantiate a 3- or 4-channel RGB(A) color from a Scalar value
      ColorRGBA(java.lang.String hexCode)
      Instantiate a 3- or 4-channel RGB(A) color from a hex code

      • ColorRGBA

                 int g,

        Parameters:
        r - Red channel (0-255)
        g - Green channel (0-255)
        b - Blue channel (0-255)

      • ColorRGBA

        public ColorRGBA(int r,
                 int g,
                 int b,
                 int a)
        Instantiate a 4-channel RGBA color
        Parameters:
        r - Red channel (0-255)
        g - Green channel (0-255)
        b - Blue channel (0-255)
        a - Alpha channel (0-255), where 0 is transparent and 255 is opaque

      • ColorRGBA

        public ColorRGBA(Scalar scalar)
        Instantiate a 3- or 4-channel RGB(A) color from a Scalar value
        Parameters:
        scalar - Scalar value with 3-4 channels

      • ColorRGBA

        public ColorRGBA(java.lang.String hexCode)
        Instantiate a 3- or 4-channel RGB(A) color from a hex code
        Parameters:
        hexCode - Hex code, such as #ffffff (white) or #0000ffaa (partially transparent blue) Code must be 6 or 8 characters long
